page.title: 11 My visit to the R.A.F.
page.content: Saturday 30th June 1985. On Saturday I went to Stafford R.A.F.open day. It was 25p to get in. It was lovely and sunny which made the day really good. I went with my sister. Before we went we saw the Red Arrows fly really low overhead. At the R.A.F. it was packed with people.There was a Noddy Train and a fire engine which you could have a ride on, some pony rides and a car boot sale. They even had a kiddies corner which the children could play in. I had a go with a mine detector. The man put some ear phones on me which fell over my eyes but he put them back on .I found the mine . The man said if you trod on it, it would blow up but it was disconnected . Alison Dickens age 9.
